price: 14. Hadduuna jirin Fadliga Alle korkiinna iyo Naxariistiisu adduun iyo Aakhiraba, waxaa idinku taaban lahaa waxaad ku hadasheen darteed cadaab daran.
arabic: وَلَوۡلَا فَضۡلُ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيۡكُمۡ وَرَحۡمَتُهُۥ فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ لَمَسَّكُمۡ فِي مَآ أَفَضۡتُمۡ فِيهِ عَذَابٌ عَظِيمٌ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walawlā faḍlu al-lahi ʿalaykum waraḥmatuhu fī al-dun'yā wal-ākhirati lamassakum fī mā afaḍtum fīhi ʿadhābun ʿaẓīmun
